Если купить эту игру со скидкой, то она вполне стоит своих денег, особенно когда выживаешь против кучи зомби под прикрытием друзей, затягивает, много карт и перков, с чистой совестью могу рекомендовать приобрести ёё.

Despite all the hours of fun I've had in this game I can't just give it a positive review because of all the bugs this game has.
Some of these bugs include:
[list]
[*] After the first wave spawns some textures turn white like the streets in KF-WestLondon and the pipes in KF-Foundry and many more. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/1250/discussions/0/828936718989484263/]Bug report thread[/url]
[*] Sometimes the keyboard input does not work after joining a server, you have to restart the game to be able to actually move.
[*] Stalkers are most of the time black and sometimes have a reflecting silver texture and never become invisible like they're supposed to.
[*] Scrakes however do get transparent which is really annoying because thay're way stonger.
[*] Most player models are completely black.
[*] The Husk fireball launcher has no texture, making it completely black.
[*] It's impossible to ALT+TAB out of the game without opening the steam overlay.
[*] When entering back into the game from the desktop it sometimes does not go back into fullscreen mode and the mouse is not getting captured which makes you spread bullets everywhere except for what you're aiming at.
[*] The settings menu has an option to enable Direct3D rendering, but enabling it makes you unable to start the game until you delete the config files. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/1250/discussions/0/846938351034501313/]Bug report thread[/url]
[*] There is no way to open the console even though the key is configurable in the settings menu. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/1250/discussions/0/46476690797354954/]Bug report thread[/url]
[*] Steam friend integration does not work, making you unable to join your friends from the friend list.
[*] The only way to join a friend's server is it find it in the server list or use the "open IP" command which you cannot use because the console won't open.
[/list]

And that's only a few of them.

All these issues have been well known ever since the game was ported two years ago but the developers never cared enough to fix them which really bothers me.
I'd really like to give this game a positive review because despite the issues it has it's still a very fun game. But I won't be able to until Tripwire gets their shit together.

But that's just my opinion.
</rant>

Online Co-Op? Check. FPS? Check. Zombie slaying? Check. Sweet DLC? Check. This game will remind you what makes a zombie game fun and all the rave. Teamwork is essential as you fight your way wave after wave of dead goodness. You'll lose yourself in this imersive world of the undead, as every bullet you shoot decides the fate of your team. Highly recommended, IGN 10/10. Deal with it.

Killing Floor is one of the best Muliti-Player games I have ever played, such a good teamwork based game and I would recommend it to people who haven't played it before or that are thinking of buying it, never had so much fun on a game :)
Killing zombies whilst playing as racistly steryotypical English men. what more could you possibly want?!
The Best.

Великолепный шутер. Отличный движок, приятный глазу, а также куча разнообразных карт - от запутанных и мрачных до просторных и светлых.
Имеется:
* 5 уровней сложности, что значит, что гораздо легче попасть в наиболее комфортный.
* 6 перков, из которых можно заполучить нужную комбинацию, способную проходить многие карты.
* Около 300 достижений, которые не дадут заскучать, а некоторые так и откроют доступ к некоторому оружию и скинам персонажей.
* Различные "мутаторы" - модификаторы игры - облегчают игру, показывают нужную информацию (Убитый монстр, нанесенный урон, etc.)
Также скоро выйдет вторая часть, так что те, кого графон 2009 года не устраивает, могут порадоваться и поиграть в обновленную версию.

Жестких минусов у Killing Floor не замечаю - главное, чтобы было с кем поиграть - имею ввиду друзей. Покупайте и наслаждайтесь ею! И помните:на вкус и цвет фломастеры разные!

I'm trying to heal you, not shag you.
Fucking love this game <3

One of the best horde coop shotters. 

The gameplay is excellent and is very satisfying. 
Each class is specialized in a different way.
Fx. The support is good with shotguns and the commando is good with submachineguns.
The coop is good, although some time you will end up with some bad players.

The grapichs are good, although you can see it's becoming a bit old (it was released in 2009 dammit XD).
But not in such a big deal that it will ruin the game for you. 

The game consits of dealing with "smaller" enemies or zeds that will attack you over 4-7 or 10 waves, based on what you have chosen. 
Until you have to fight the boss. 
This is were the difficulty comes into play. 
Based upon the difficulty it controls the amount of damage zeds do, the amount of health they have, and the number of zeds there will appear in the round. 

It has a very checky and funny humor and is hilarious to play when they do some of their events (halloween, summer,winter)

So try it out, i highly recommend it.
